extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ITSSqlModule(DBSettings dbSettings)
      this will create the sql module for its and the passed db settings and connect to the database

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearTables(String project)
      this will delete all tables of a project and recreates them
      void close()
      closes the connection to the database
      void finishImport()
      writes all pending changes to the database and closes the database connection after it

      searches issues from a project that matches the search parameters
      void importComment(int commentId, int ticketId, String description, String author, Date creationDate)
      adds a statement to the batch queue to import a comment with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the issues and comments each 500 statements that were added

      adds a statement to the batch queue to import a comment with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the issues and comments each 500 statements that were added

      • ITSSqlModule

        public ITSSqlModule(DBSettings dbSettings)
             throws SQLException
        this will create the sql module for its and the passed db settings and connect to the database
        Parameters:
        dbSettings - the settings for the database connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - if no connection to the database could be established

      • prepareTicketImport

        public void prepareTicketImport(String project)
                         throws SQLException
        prepares the sql module to import issues, if necessary tables are created
        Parameters:
        project - the project for which the sql module shall be prepared
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

        Throws:

      • importIssue

        public void importIssue(int ticketId,
                        String name,
                        String title,
                        String description,
                        String author,
                        Date creationDate,
                        String state,
                        String assignee,
                        String targetVersion)
                 throws SQLException
        adds a statement to the batch queue to import an issue with the given arguments
        Parameters:
        ticketId - id of the ticket
        name - name of the ticket
        title - title of the ticket
        description - description of the ticket
        author - author of the ticket
        creationDate - date of creation of the ticket
        state - state of the ticket
        assignee - assignee of the ticket
        targetVersion - targetversion / milestone of the ticket
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query

      • importComment

        public void importComment(int commentId,
                          int ticketId,
                          String description,
                          String author,
                          Date creationDate)
                   throws SQLException
        adds a statement to the batch queue to import a comment with the given arguments and executes the batch of sql queries for the issues and comments each 500 statements that were added
        Parameters:
        commentId - id of the comment
        ticketId - id of the ticket the comment belongs to
        description - description of the comment
        author - author of the comment
        creationDate - date the comment was created
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database connection failed or an error exist in a sql query
